Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.http.events.Request

  • Packages that use Request 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.http
    Provides components for building a HTTP server based on the core and IO components.
    org.jgrapes.http.events
    Provides the events handled by the server components.
    org.jgrapes.http.freemarker
    Provides a base component for generating template based responses to HTTP requests.

    • Uses of Request in org.jgrapes.http

      Associates the event with a LanguageSelector.Selection object using Selection.class as association identifier.
      void SessionManager.onRequest(Request event)
      Associates the event with a Session object using Session.class as association identifier.
      void HttpServer.onRequest(Request event, IOSubchannel appChannel)
      Provides a fall back handler (lowest priority) for the request types specified in the constructor.
      static boolean ResponseCreationSupport.sendStaticContent(Request event, IOSubchannel channel, Function<String,URL> resolver, List<ResponseCreationSupport.ValidityInfo> validityInfos)
      Creates and sends a response with static content.
